elements.name: Presence, in playing mode, of Edit Mode Button

steps.name: the game is in playing mode
an "Edit Mode" button should be visible
the game is in playing mode
I press the "Edit Mode" button
the board should be editable

elements.name: Presence of buttons to get out of Edit Mode

steps.name: the game is in edit mode
a "Save" button should be visible
a "Cancel" button should be visible
the game is in edit mode
I modify the board
I press the "Save" button
the board should reflect the changes made
the game should return to playing mode
the game is in edit mode
I modify the board
I press the "Cancel" button
the changes should be discarded
the game should return to playing mode

description:
Rules:
    * The game board is a 4x4 grid.
    * The player can move tiles using arrow keys.
    * Tiles with the same number merge when they collide.
    * A new tile (2 or 4) appears after each move.
    * If no tile can move in the direction of the arrow key pressed, no new tile appears.
    * If no tile can move in any direction, the game is over.
